objects.text:
• Digital LED Display
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles
• Quiet Operation Technology

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Easy-to-Use Controls
• Sleek White Design with Modern Black Accent Door
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles for Various Fabric Types
• Energy-Efficient Operation to Save on Utility Bills
• Large Capacity Perfect for Family-Sized Loads
• Advanced Temperature Control System
• Quiet Operation Technology
• Electronic Touch Controls with Rotary Dial
• Compact Front-Loading Design
• Multiple Water Level Settings
• Automatic Moisture Sensing in Dryer
• Ventilated Drum Design for Efficient Drying
• Built-in End-of-Cycle Signal
• Durable Construction with Adjustable Feet
• Easy-Access Maintenance Panel

banner_details:
This banner features a modern promotional layout designed to highlight a laundry appliance set. The design is divided into four quadrants with a clean and structured grid overlay. The top left section introduces the brand with a bold title (`heading`), a sleek tagline (`tagline`), and a subheading (`subheading`) styled in futuristic fonts. Adjacent to it on the top right, a product image (`product_image`) showcases the washer and dryer set, balancing the layout visually.

The bottom left quadrant displays a checklist of product features (`description`) and emphasizes the pricing (`price`) in a prominent, eye-catching style. Below it, a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with centered text (`cta`) invites user interaction. The bottom right quadrant includes a motivational message (`heading_2`) to engage potential customers emotionally.

The geometric background design, intersecting lines, decorative circles, and light textures generate depth and visual interest without distracting from the content.

**Color Palette:**
- Royal Blue `#4A86E8`
- Soft Light Blue `#E8F0FF`
- White `#FFFFFF`
- Charcoal `#333333`
- Cool Gray Blue (used subtly in gradients and lines) `#A1C0FF`
- Medium Blue (overlay circle) `#3D76D1`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern washing machine and dryer set that predominantly uses a clean, minimalist color palette. The base color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF) that evokes cleanliness and modernity. The control panels are accented in black (#000000), adding contrast and visual clarity. Subtle metallic silver (#C0C0C0) is used on the dial, enhancing the premium look. The blue LED display uses a bright electric blue (#00BFFF), drawing attention to its tech features. These colors blend seamlessly, with high-contrast elements ensuring key features stand out. A banner should integrate these with complementary cool tones like steel gray (#A9A9A9).
